comments:
When I unpack either the M5 release or the integration build my eclipse 3.3 won't start afterwards.
The following stacktrace is thrown on me...

Exception in thread "Thread-2" java.lang.NullPointerException: You cannot parameterize a null parameter

It sounds like you unpacked the target platform into your existing eclipse installation. If you did so, please see the installation description of the RAP target platform at http://www.eclipse.org/rap/downloads.php

traces.message: You cannot parameterize a null parameter
